resources.string: Goalie is an app that helps you to reach your goals. Goalie does so by motivating you to keep a regular and healthy lifestyle. You and your therapist decide together which goals are most appropriate for you.
Goalie is meant for mental health patients.
How do I get an account?
Together with your therapist you register for an account for Goalie. You choose your own account name and password, try not to forget them.
If you want more information you can always contact your therapist, but you can also take a look online at goalie.sense-os.nl.
